articles.description: Scott McTominay seals his status as a Napoli icon with a spectacular first goal as his side defeat Cagliari to win Serie A.
articles.title: Napoli win Serie A: Scott McTominay an icon after Man Utd move

articles.description: Why Ben Stokes' 20-ball cameo as a bowler meant more to England than anything else in the ongoing Test against Zimbabwe.
articles.title: Ben Stokes: England captain cheers fans with impressive bowling cameo

articles.description: With Trent Alexander-Arnold's Liverpool departure looming, BBC Sport explores the complicated relationship between fans and local players.
articles.title: Trent Alexander-Arnold: The relationship between local players & fans

articles.description: Liverpool make initial contact with Bayer Leverkusen over a move for attacking midfielder Florian Wirtz.
articles.title: Florian Wirtz: Liverpool make contact with Bayer Leverkusen

articles.description: The Monaco Grand Prix will feature a mandatory two pit stops for every driver in an effort to make the race more unpredictable - but will it work?
articles.title: Monaco Grand Prix: Will mandatory two pits stops 'spice it up a bit more'?

articles.description: Novak Djokovic moves one win away from his 100th ATP Tour-level singles title with a hard-fought victory against Britain's Cameron Norrie.
articles.title: Geneva  Open: Novak Djokovic beats Cameron Norrie to reach final and close in on 100th title

articles.description: Bath clinch their first European title in 17 years with a commanding display against Lyon in the Challenge Cup final.
articles.title: European Challenge Cup final: Bath 37-12 Lyon

articles.description: England take an unassailable 2-0 lead in the T20 series against West Indies with a dominant nine-wicket win at Hove.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: Nat Sciver-Brunt and Em Arlott star as hosts secure T20 series win

articles.description: Former Liverpool and Aston Villa goalkeeper Pepe Reina is sent off in his last match before retiring as his Como side lose 2-0 to Serie A runners-up Inter Milan.
articles.title: Como 0-2 Inter Milan: Ex-Liverpool goalkeeper Pepe Reina sent off in last game

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at the rise of Renee Slegers as she prepares to lead Arsenal into the Women's Champions League final against Barcelona on Saturday.
articles.title: Renee Slegers: The player, the coach and the person behind the Arsenal boss
